name: A Fragment of Hope
description:
(Fullscreen is highly recommended as some effects are relative to screen size) 

Navigate your way through the dark woods in search for the lost spirit orbs. Collect them with your detached soul and grow stronger once they are all together. Once you are at your strongest, you can take on the creatures of the forest. No matter how lost you are, there will always be A Fragment of Hope.

MoveA - DJumpWDetach Soul/ReattachSpace

Once your sould is detached, you can control it with your cursor.

There it was...

left with a shattered soul,

broken into ten fine pieces.

Fragments fill the dark forest,

protected by the Lurkers.

Will all be restored?

(Game made for The Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1)
